snippet: The body of Erich Priebke, a former SS captain, has been buried in an anonymous grave in an abandoned cemetery in an Italian prison, the newspaper La Repubblica said Thursday.
abstract: Body of Erich Priebke, former SS captain who had been serving a life sentence for his role in the execution of over 300 people in 1944 near Rome, has been buried in an anonymous grave in an abandoned cemetery in an Italian prison.
lead_paragraph: The body of Erich Priebke, a former SS captain, has been buried in an anonymous grave in an abandoned cemetery in an Italian prison, the newspaper La Repubblica said Thursday.

headline.main: Italy: Nazi War Criminal Buried at Jail
headline.print_headline: Italy: Nazi War Criminal Buried at Jail

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
